description: Social media reshaped the presidential bully pulpit, becoming the chief news vector for American voters in the most chaotic election cycle of the modern era.
title: Biden tweets instead of talks, as Elon Musk seizes on chaotic election

description: Amazon struck deals with Staples and other retailers to let customers drop off returns. Workers say the flood of “Amazombies” burdens them with extra work.
title: Returns of the ‘Amazombies’: Unwanted packages are a retail nightmare
